title: Drawing, "Papal escutcheon"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red ink at upper edge
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle. Supported by two winged female genii, the right one having a trumpet in her left arm. In front of a niche which is supported by a base. The background is colored. Written in the upper right corner: "36".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Papal escutcheon".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red ink at upper edge. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1819.
